data.event: It is now included with the rest of the municipality in the Lower Sava Statistical Region.

event.title: was attested in written sources in 1161

data.event: Raka was attested in written sources in 1161 as Arch (and as Archa in 1249, and Arch in 1279).

event.title: was destroyed in a peasant revolt in 1515

data.event: It was destroyed in a peasant revolt in 1515.
